intro: Ternstroemia guerrerensis, commonly known as the Guerrerense Ternstroemia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Theaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of Central America, particularly in southern Mexico. This evergreen shrub or small tree typically grows in humid, shaded environments within tropical forests. Its leaves are usually elliptical, glossy, and have a leathery texture. The plant produces small, white or pale yellow flowers that are clustered in inflorescences, followed by small, capsule-like fruits.
